description: This file sets up an agent with a specific model and tools, downloads an image, reads its bytes, and prompts the agent to analyze the image and provide news about it.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with models and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image, used as input for analysis.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A language model from Anthropic used for generating responses.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for performing searches via DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: download_image
methods.description: Downloads an image from a URL to a specified output path.
